mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Hank Williams Day at historic Leiper's Ford including a huge collection of Hank Williams Memorabilia and live music from Homer Dever and Don Helms on September 20. Poster features a metal photoplate of Hank Williams' 1948 Packard touring car.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
